rent a commercial walk in freezer, -24 C, put a freeze drying machine in there, go in with flowers and dip them in liquid nitrogen until they are frozen to bone. being in a walk in freezer will prevent the flower from just unfreezing quickly so you can carefully put it into freeze dryer and then pull a vaccum (coming to think about it it should be possible to just do it using standard vaccum chamber as walk in freezer would keep the temp low). that should make the flower hold its shape as its drying.
